project_name.justification: The article is titled 'Gold79 Completes Acquisition of the Tip Top Gold Project' and states 'Gold79 now owns 100% of the Tip Top Project in Nevada.'

company_name.justification: The text identifies the acquiring company: 'Gold79 Mines Ltd. (TSXV: AUU) (OTCQB: AUSVF) ("Gold79" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that it has made the final acquisition payment of US$25,000 to the vendor of the Tip Top project.'

ceo_buyer.justification: The press release identifies the CEO in the contact section: 'Derek Macpherson, President & CEO'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states: 'Gold79 now owns 100% of the Tip Top Project in Nevada.'

primary_commodity.justification: The article is titled 'Gold79 Completes Acquisition of the Tip Top Gold Project' and mentions 'low-sulfidation oxide gold-silver epithermal veins'.

verified_article_link.justification: The article is titled 'Gold79 Completes Acquisition of the Tip Top Gold Project' and the content is entirely focused on this project, confirming its relevance.

currency.justification: The text specifies the currency in the payment details: '...final acquisition payment of US$25,000...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash consideration is the sum of the final payment and a future milestone payment: 'With the final payment of US$25,000 on May 9, 2024, Gold79 has completed its acquisition...' and 'the Company is obligated to pay the vendor a cash payment of US$200,000 within 30 days of completion of a bankable feasibility study.'

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms described in the article do not mention any payment in shares.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: An explicit cash payment value was identified, so this field is null per the extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction terms described in the article do not mention any issuance of shares.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms described in the article do not mention any payment in warrants.

option_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms described in the article do not mention any payment in options.

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction terms described in the article do not mention any issuance of shares, so there is no associated share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The article does not mention any exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The article does not mention any monetary exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text states that the seller has retained a royalty as part of the transaction: 'The Vendor retains a 1% net smelter return royalty on the property...'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The article does not specify the size or area of the Tip Top project.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The article does not specify the size or area of the Tip Top project.

resource_size.justification: The text provides historical production figures ('6,900 ounces of gold') and drill intercepts, but does not contain a formal, quantified mineral resource estimate for the project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified as Gold79 Mines Ltd., and the text provides its ticker information directly: 'Gold79 Mines Ltd. (TSXV: AUU) (OTCQB: AUSVF)'.
